'''Hundad''' was the son of [[Hundar]], who was of the [[House of Haleth]], and the father of [[Hardang]].<ref>{{WJ|West}}, ''(iii) The Haladin'', p. 237</ref>  It was said that neither Hundad nor his son Hardang were men of mark or gallantry.<ref>{{WJ|West}}, ''(iii) The Haladin'', note 55, p. 308</ref>
